modName: RRA - Realistic Race Armours - Because just iron and steel is just boring
summary: A mod which changes the armour of Orcs, Wood Elves, Deadra, Dark Elves, High Elves and more so that they wear their native armour and weapons in battle!
descriptionHtml:
This Description box is undergoing a lot of work, please bear with it and any outdated information it may contain. I will release the next version of the mod with a new, nicer looking description.
[img]http://i1057.photobucket.com/albums/t390/sambeevors/itsyourrmod.jpg[/img]
[color=red][b]This mod was a request. To request a mod, use this link: [/b][code]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/769703-its-your-mod/[/code] ( You will have to copy and paste into you\'re browser.) [/color]

[b] I would personally like to thank the following people:

[color=red]loismustdie555[/color]
Thirif
etherealblade
odst013
korgthil
c00ky
atomicliquorice
muffinman593
DanielLiswinski
[/b]

A mod which changes the armour of Orcs, Wood Elves, Deadra, Dark Elves, High Elves and more so that they wear their native armour and weapons in battle!

[color=blue][b]There is now a video for this Mod, check out the videos tab[/b][/color]

[b] CHANGE LOG [/b]
Version 0.3A
Added \'Rusty\' armour to the game for the poorer orcs  
Added \'Rusty\' weapons to the game for the much poorer orcs  
Fixed a few bugs  
Made Chiefs of strongholds / bandit camps more noticeable with a randomly generated circlet  

CURRENT FEATURES
All Orcs in the game have been equipped with Orcish weapons, and any iron or steel armour has been replaced with Orcish armour.
Custom Outfits added for Orc hunters so they will wear hunter armour with addition pieces of Orcish armour in some instances.
Not all Orcs have Orcish armour, as it is not realistic for them to afford it, so some have a few parts or hide/leather armour instead. It\\\'s just more common than iron / steel on an Orc.
All High elves in game to have Glass/Elven Armour and weapons more commonly.
All the Armours that the races commonly use now have a Rusty varient, will stats similar to iron and sometimes steel.

FEATURES IN PROGRESS
All Wood elves in game to have Fur Armour and weapons more commonly.
All Dark elves in game to have Ebony Armour and weapons more commonly.
All Deadra in game to have Deadric Armour and weapons more commonly.
Make it so there are 3 tiers below regular armour (e.g. Rusty, Tattered, Dinted) just like how there are tiers above regular armour (e.g. Fine, Superior, Epic)

I DO UNDERSTAND THAT THIS WILL MAKE ARMOURS EASY TO OBTAIN, TO RESOLVE THIS I HAVE ADDED \'RUSTY\' VARIANTS OF THE WEAPONS AND ARMOURS

This mod was created for 3 main reasons:
Firstly to make fighting enemies more challenging,
Secondly to make make obtaining rare armours easier,
and Finally, to make more races unique from one another.

KNOWN BUGS
If you load the mod last, it will conflict with all mods which affect anyone\'s armour in the game, please load this mod first (After Skyrim and any other DLC\'s you have installed and it will be fine)

PLEASE ENDORSE AS THIS MOD TOOK A VERY LONG TIME TO COMPLETE DUE TO THE FACT EVERY NONE-HUMAN NPC HAS TO BE EDITED ONE AT A TIME
author: Sam Beevors

files.name: NEWEST RRA - Ebony Update
files.changelogHtml:
Added Damaged Ebony weapons and armour
Added Damaged Ebony weapons and armour to the loot list
Added a chest in Solitude where you can easily acquire this armour (95% chance you will get it)
Added an Easter egg (Hint: Dragonsreach)
